messages.content: VOTE: Option 2 (Auto-stash) + Option 1 (Pre-check guard). RATIONALE: Using --no-verify is a security regression. We must fix the verification script to be context-aware. If the environment is a Worktree, the script should resolve paths relative to the Worktree root, not the main repo root. I am currently implementing a 'Smart Path Resolver' for verify_code.py to ensure security hooks pass in all execution modes.
